short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hydration Reminder reminds you to drink some water at the time interval that you want

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All of us usually forget to drink water while spending hours in front of the screen. Hydration Reminder is here to remind you to drink water at the time interval that you desire. Stay Hydrated!
